headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SCHURIN, EMILY VAN NESS

snippet: SCHURIN--Emily Van Ness, 68, died June 14 after a long battle with cancer. Survived by her husband Ron, sons Zachary and Matthew, daughter-in-law Leah Kamin, grandson Daniel, brothers James (Anna) and Michael and sisters Deirdre (Ron) and Molly (Jim), and many nieces and nephews. Calling hours Friday, June 17 6:00-8:00pm at Potter Funeral Home, 456 Jackson Street, Willimantic, CT; memorial service 2:00pm Saturday, June 18, Hope Lutheran Church, 62 Dog Lane, Storrs, CT; interment 12:00 noon Friday, June 24, Princeton Cemetery, 29 Greenview Avenue, Princeton, NJ. Contributions may be made to Peace Action Education Fund, 40 Witherspoon Street, Princeton, NJ 08542; Hartford Hospital CB-2, Hartford Hospital Fund Development, 80 Seymour Street, Hartford, CT 06102; or an organization of the sender's choice. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHURIN--Emily Van Ness, 68, died June 14 after a long battle with cancer. Survived by her husband Ron, sons Zachary and Matthew, daughter-in-law Leah Kamin, grandson Daniel, brothers James (Anna) and Michael and sisters Deirdre (Ron) and Molly (Jim), and many nieces and nephews. Calling hours Friday, June 17 6:00-8:00pm at Potter Funeral Home, 456 Jackson Street, Willimantic, CT; memorial service 2:00pm Saturday, June 18, Hope Lutheran Church, 62 Dog Lane, Storrs, CT; interment 12:00 noon Friday, June 24, Princeton Cemetery, 29 Greenview Avenue, Princeton, NJ. Contributions may be made to Peace Action Education Fund, 40 Witherspoon Street, Princeton, NJ 08542; Hartford Hospital CB-2, Hartford Hospital Fund Development, 80 Seymour Street, Hartford, CT 06102; or an organization of the sender's choice. 1/3
